name: Eradicating PSN Command and Control Positions
description: Strategic techniques to dismantle PSN leadership structures without direct confrontation.

cards.title: Psychological Erosion of Leadership
cards.description: Undermining PSN authority figures through calculated psychological warfare.
bulletpoints: Exposing inconsistencies in their narratives erodes their influence.
Amplifying their weaknesses to followers causes internal defection.
Forcing them into paranoia through controlled leaks weakens their strategic effectiveness.

cards.title: Depleting PSN Resource Pipelines
cards.description: Cutting off economic, logistical, and social resources to starve PSN leadership.
bulletpoints: Targeting financial dependencies forces them into unsustainable operations.
Blocking their ability to recruit new enforcers weakens their enforcement capacity.
Isolating key figures from trusted networks increases their vulnerability.

cards.title: Turning PSNs Against Each Other
cards.description: Using deception and manipulation to create leadership fractures.
bulletpoints: Exploiting egotistical tendencies induces power struggles within their ranks.
Pitting them against external threats forces them to expend resources unnecessarily.
Leaking false accusations among leadership fuels internal betrayal and collapse.
